Text: Your problem is you are pointing to image file in wrong way it should be like this if you will not add `http://` protocol browser will read it as file/directory and will find your image like this Assumming you are in `localhost` root directory browser will load it as http://localhost/localhost/banner.php?id=STEAMID&bg=bg1&rank=0 instead of http://localhost/banner.php?id=STEAMID&bg=bg1&rank=0

Your problem is you are pointing to image file in wrong way it should be like this if you will not add `http://` protocol browser will read it as file/directory and will find your image like this Assumming you are in `localhost` root directory browser will load it as http://localhost/localhost/banner.php?id=STEAMID&bg=bg1&rank=0 instead of http://localhost/banner.php?id=STEAMID&bg=bg1&rank=0 When you direct access your image your browser read it as http://localhost/banner.php?id=STEAMID&bg=bg1&rank=0
